storyInfo: Fumizuki arranges matters such that Ch'en and Lin Yühsia bump into each other in the Bolívarian city of Dossoles. There, the city's mayor introduces the duo to a guide named Ernesto and gives them a mission.

attributes.content: Well, if this isn't a shocker! Who could have known this would happen during the highly-anticipated scrimmage preliminaries?!
attributes.name: Prelim MC

attributes.content: Two non-participants who joined the fray out of nowhere ended up our final victors!
attributes.name: Prelim MC

attributes.content: Mr. Pancho, is something like this going to fly?!
attributes.name: Prelim MC

attributes.content: Ahem... Indeed, this rarely happens in our competitions, and, in principle, we prefer our contestants follow the competition's rules.
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: It's very regrettable, then...
attributes.name: Prelim MC

attributes.content: However.
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: It isn't so bad for something like this to happen once in a while.
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: Right! Ahem, it's very regrettable, then! I am afraid we have bad news for our other contestants!
attributes.name: Prelim MC

attributes.content: Heh, looks like the MC's pretty good at thinking on the fly. He was about to say we were disqualified.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Maybe.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Looks like we barged into some competition venue.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: If I remember correctly, this is the Smash Splash Preliminaries.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: But don't forget the whole point of the competitions is to bring joy to the people!
attributes.name: Prelim MC

attributes.content: Although the two of them did not go through the proper procedures to join our competition, thanks to their extraordinary skills and flawless teamwork, they survived until the very end!
attributes.name: Prelim MC

attributes.content: What a fantastic turn of events! Let us give these ladies a huge round of applause for their performance!
attributes.name: Prelim MC

attributes.content: He said our teamwork was flawless. Were we even working together?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: I sure hope not.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: *Sigh*... how did this happen?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Dad, what's the story behind this invitation...?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Another year, another letter, eh? That woman doesn't know when to give up.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: What woman? Give up on what?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Is this something I should tell Mom?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Settle down. It's one of the mayors from that commercial city alliance. Some ten years ago, Wei Yenwu was still in the mood to go visit himself. These days, they only talk to each other via Messenger.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: But she's not one to take no for an answer. She sends both of us invitation letters to go visit around this time every year.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Commercial alliance... The one in Columbia?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: No, it's in Bolívar. You heard of it before. She's the mayor there.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Dossoles... Candela Sanchez?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: I heard that place is a money sink... Are you not going?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: It's halfway across the world, and what would I do there? My arms and legs are too old for that kind of abuse.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Besides, even if I were in the mood for a trip, it's meaningless if Wei Yenwu doesn't go.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: That's right. The one they want to butter up to is the Chief of Lungmen, Mr. Wei, and it's true that he doesn't have the luxury to take a trip now, given all the responsibilities on his shoulders.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Please don't sell yourself short either, Dad. If you were to take a trip, we wouldn't have anyone look after the flowers at the shop, and the uncles would have one less person to play chess with.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Seoi neoi. So that's how you compare me to Wei Yenwu.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Our cities have a trade agreement. If Wei Yenwu had his heart set on going, he'd go. He's sick of Dossoles, and it's certainly not worth visiting.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: And if Wei Yenwu isn't going, then I'm not going either.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Okay, I understand. I'll toss the invitation, then.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Hm? A phone call from Lady Fumizuki?
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Mr. Lin, it's me.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: Lady Fumizuki, to what do I owe the pleasure?
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: A phone call from Lady Fumizuki? I'll give you the room...
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Is that Yühsia? Ask her to stay. This has to do with her as well.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: Yühsia, stay.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Mr. Lin, I'm sure you, too, received the invitation?
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: As always. Is something the matter?
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Personally, I am quite fond of the idea of going on a holiday there, but you know how Yenwu is. You couldn't find a lazier person if you tried.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: Of course. But it seems you have a different idea?
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: I would like Yühsia to visit the city in Yenwu's stead.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: That's...
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: I will persuade Yenwu. You needn't worry.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: Absolutely, you are the boss, after all. But that's not what concerns me...
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: I'll get to the point. It's far too soon for Yühsia to take on so much responsibility.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Dad, what did Lady Fumizuki say?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: She wants you to go to Dossoles in Wei Yenwu's stead.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: I'll go.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Yühsia.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: I am going.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Mr. Lin?
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: Fine, if my daughter wants to go on a trip, is it her father's place to say no?
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: She can go.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Very well. Yühsia, make sure to pack for a long trip.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: I will.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Yühsia.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: I'll bring you some souvenirs, Dad.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: *Sigh*... Nei go sei seoi neoi ah...
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Alright, then. It's settled. Get yourself ready for the trip. You will be away for some time. Have your mother help you pack.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: If this is what Lady Fumizuki wants, I am sure there is more to it than we know. A holiday... Does this have something to do with Ch'en?
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Whatever... No use thinking about it so much. It's not like she'd want to pull any strings to take advantage of Yühsia, what with how fond of the youngsters she is.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: That aside... *Sigh*.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Looks like there's no keeping her home when she's all grown up.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Fumizuki, did you arrange for Lin Yühsia's trip to Dossoles?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: I did.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: What's the problem? They invited us not because they had any actual business to discuss with you. It's just a vacation trip.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: You wanted to send Hui-chieh, didn't you?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: That's right. I was never trying to hide it from you, however.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: If Lin Yühsia is my representative there, Hui-chieh will get to take it easy and have as much fun as she wants, but...
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Ch'en is at Rhodes Island right now. Although I trust them, I have no way of knowing how she is doing there.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: Besides, I know our little Ch'en is in no position to represent you right now. Yühsia, on the other hand, always does a good job with everything. She is the perfect substitute.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: The Rat King's daughter won't necessarily become the Rat King herself.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: If that's what she wants, then give her a chance, and if she manages to seize the opportunity, it just shows how capable she is.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: Or will the venerable Chief Wei send all of Lungmen's forces after me, a frail lady, for overstepping my boundaries?
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: You know I always listen to you when I make these decisions. It's just...
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: You've met Candela. Hui-chieh and Yühsia are still far too young to handle her.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: For how often you call me a worrywart, it certainly seems like you are the biggest in the room.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: If it wasn't for your personality, perhaps you could've found yourself on better terms with our little Ch'en.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: We are not discussing this right now, Fumizuki.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: *Sigh*, Dossoles is famous not only in Bolívar, but all across the world, and it is in no small part because of her. She is no ordinary woman.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: We've been there before. It's a city you could never have imagined in a thousand years.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: Given she built it singlehandedly, it's no wonder that you fear her, both as the Chief of Lungmen and from a personal standpoint.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: You agree with me, then...
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: But you big shots are always so calculating, trying to get the upper hand over each other, and it's always the first thing that crosses your mind when meeting anyone.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: If I have to say, I saw it the moment I laid my eyes on Candela. She's the kind of person who's capable of many things. Bad things. But she definitely won't do anything that puts Ch'en and Yühsia in harm's way.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: You think she will be a bad example for the children, but I think there's no better place to send them.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: If you are so worried, Yühsia most likely hasn't left for Dossoles yet, and I haven't sent the letter out to Ch'en either. There is still time.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: Fine, we'll do as you say.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Hm, I spotted a few Rhodes Islanders just now, I think...? Don't tell me they came to Siesta too...
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Guess I'll go find out in a minute.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Who is it?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Miss Ch'en, sorry to interrupt your vacation.
attributes.name: Shirayuki

attributes.content: Shirayuki? What are you doing here?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I have a letter for you from the Princess. It's of the utmost importance.
attributes.name: Shirayuki

attributes.content: Did something happen in Lungmen?!
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Not at all. Please, read the letter.
attributes.name: Shirayuki

attributes.content: Where is it...?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Here.
attributes.name: Shirayuki

attributes.content: There's an invitation inside...? I'll start with the letter.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.text: Dear Ch'en, It's been a long while. Are you doing well at Rhodes Island? Have you been eating right and getting enough rest?

attributes.content: She's always such a worrywart.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.text: Here's the thing. I am sure you have already found attached with the letter an invitation. It was sent to us by the mayor of a Bolívarian city. Alas, we don't have the time to make this visit ourselves, so after I discussed this with Yenwu, we would like you to visit the city in our place.

The city is named Dossoles; you might have heard of it. There is a large artificial lake there and many entertainment facilities. It's a great place for a holiday. I am sure the fatigue must be adding up with how Rhodes Island is sending you everywhere. You should take this chance to get some rest. I will talk to Rhodes Island, so you needn't worry. From, Wei Fumizuki

attributes.content: But... I'm on a holiday right now.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: It would seem the princess isn't aware of this.
attributes.name: Shirayuki

attributes.content: Right. Still, Dossoles, huh...? Shirayuki, do you know how far away that is?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: The city is in northwestern Bolívar. If you leave now, it will take roughly fifteen days.
attributes.name: Shirayuki

attributes.content: There's no date on the invitation. Looks like any time will do for them...
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Will you accept, Miss Ch'en?
attributes.name: Shirayuki

attributes.content: How could I say no to her kindness? All I have to do is take my holiday elsewhere.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I, Shirayuki, will pass on your thanks to Lady Fumizuki, Miss Ch'en.
attributes.name: Shirayuki

attributes.content: I've told you this more times than I can count, Shirayuki. We're both operators. Stop it with the 'Miss.'
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: And my answer will remain the same, Miss. You will always be Miss Ch'en to me.
attributes.name: Shirayuki

attributes.content: Eh, whatever.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Are you coming?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: No, I'm afraid I have other matters I must attend to. My apologies.
attributes.name: Shirayuki

attributes.content: Alright, looks like it's a solo trip for me again.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: On another note, it seems that the Doctor and a few other operators have come to this city after completing their mission. If you would like, perhaps you should meet with them before you depart.
attributes.name: Shirayuki

attributes.content: Hm? So I guess my eyes didn't deceive me.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Well, I'll pass. I'll see them when I'm back at Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Indeed. Now...
attributes.name: Shirayuki

attributes.content: Not so fast, Shirayuki. You have the time to at least stay the evening, don't you? Have dinner with me tonight. We'll head out together tomorrow morning.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: As you wish, Miss.
attributes.name: Shirayuki

attributes.content: Finally. So this is Dossoles...
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: It's just like they say. Stepping into the city is enough to make you forget you're in Bolívar.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: In any case, I should first...
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Excuse me, but are you Miss Ch'en Hui-chieh?
attributes.name: Bodyguard

attributes.content: That's me, and you would be...?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: The mayor instructed me to await your arrival here.
attributes.name: Bodyguard

attributes.content: I'm only here for a holiday. Let's not go through all that trouble.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: No, the mayor specifically instructed us to contact her as soon as you arrive. Please give me just a moment.
attributes.name: Bodyguard

attributes.content: This is Control Point No. 2. We have successfully intercepted Miss Ch'en Hui-chieh.
attributes.name: Bodyguard

attributes.content: Yes... Okay, understood.
attributes.name: Bodyguard

attributes.content: Please come with us. The mayor would like to meet with you.
attributes.name: Bodyguard

attributes.content: *Sigh*, fine.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Please go on in, Miss Ch'en.
attributes.name: Bodyguard

attributes.content: Miss Ch'en Hui-chieh, looks like you made it here first.
I've long heard that the L.G.D. Special Inspection Unit Chief is a young lady of extraordinary talent. Meeting you in person has only proven that those are no mere rumors.
You... must be the mayor, Lady Sanchez?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Yes, that's right. I am Candela Sancheze, the mayor of Dossoles.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: You speak Yanese pretty well.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I've always wanted to cozy up to Mr. Wei, but he hasn't been back since ten years ago. I haven't had much use for my Yanese, even after all the time I spent learning it.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Lady Sanchez, I'm just here on vacation. I am not representing anyone.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Please, call me Candela. You may even call me Auntie, if you want. After all, it's long been my wish to become Chief Wei's sworn sister.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: I will pass, Lady San... Candela.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Hahaha...
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: The way you talk, and the way you frown. My, my, you look just like he did when he was still young.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: But I have to say, he was much more heroic than you are now.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: I'm not much related to Chief Wei...
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Don't worry. I understand.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: You have nothing to worry about, my lovely niece. Lady Fumizuki has already told me that you won't be representing anyone, and you will have no burdens on your shoulders.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Have some fun. As long as I'm here, there is nothing that can hurt you in this city.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Thank you for your kindness, then.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: You said I made it here first. Is someone else coming?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Right! Wouldn't you say it's a coincidence? She's coming from Lungmen, while you came here from Siesta, and both of you are arriving on the same day.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Who?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Hmm?
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Oh, looks like Lady Fumizuki's hiding something from you, even though you are bound to find out.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Ch'en, my lovely niece, I'm sure you already know, but there are certain formalities that Chief Wei and I must follow given our position, even if we'd rather not.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: I actually wouldn't have minded if Chief Wei had sent just any old lout off the street... Well, I guess maybe he'd still have to put a little thought into it. Someone like you, perhaps? I would honor them with the same hospitality as I am showing you now.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: And why does it matter? I invited the Weis and the Rat King here for a holiday.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: But he knows that will not do, and so do I.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: He is free to not come, but he must send someone of status. Or it would be tantamount to the Chief of Lungmen disrespecting the Mayor of Dossoles.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: You would've seen countless headlines in the newspapers of both cities, and way too many things would get unnecessarily problematic.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: So what you are saying is Chief Wei sent someone of sufficient status to represent him.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: That's right.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Is it Hoshiguma? No, maybe Swire...?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Wrong on both counts.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Then...
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Ma'am, she's here.
attributes.name: Bodyguard

attributes.content: There's your answer.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Lady Candela Sanchez, esteemed mayor of Dossoles, on behalf of the Chief of Lungmen Wei...
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Lin Yühsia?!
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Ch'en Hui-chieh?!
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: What are you doing here?!
attributes.name: Ch'en & Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Oh... I get it. No wonder Lady Fumizuki sent me.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: So you're Wei Yenwu's representative.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Looks like you two are acquainted. That's wonderful.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: We used to be classmates. That's it.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: She's a friend of a friend. We barely know each other.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: In that case, wouldn't this be the perfect opportunity for you to reconnect?
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Anyway, Lin, my dear niece.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Just like my niece Ch'en here, you may call me by my given name. No need to be so formal.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Even though you're here to represent Chief Wei, you don't need to think too much about such things. No burdens on your shoulders.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: All you need to do is enjoy this city I'm so proud of.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Understood...
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Oh, and two more things.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Please, by all means.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: First, I heard that both of you are very bright and can more than hold your own in a fight, that you girls are capable of great things.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: So I have an extra fun activity prepared just for you two, my beautiful nieces.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Activity?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Before I explain, do you know anything about our city's biggest event of this time?
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: The championship that's going on right now?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: That's right.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Dossoles's greatest feature, and indeed what it is known for all across the world, is the 'ocean' that surrounds us, and this ship sailing its waters.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: It's a piece of renovated Iberian technology. It took much blood, sweat and tears to complete. It's one of my finest masterpieces.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Including the statue on the ship's bow?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Hahaha, that's just my own little addition.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: As for the water of this 'sea,' it's all sourced from the actual, vast ocean to the north.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: The water gets dirty and starts to stink after a while, so we replace the ocean water at least twice a year.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: And this season is when most of us here head to the beach. That's why we have the water replaced around this time.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Changing the water is in itself a mundane process. Not only that, but we even have to take away a day of fun from our esteemed guests.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Nonetheless, I don't want to have our guests play in any filthy seawater either. It would be an insult to Dossoles's fame.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: And that's how the Dossoles Warrior Champion came to be.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: This is a variety competition event that takes place all across the city, and it is entirely sponsored by me, at my expense.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: I will have someone give you a more detailed explanation later if you would like to know more.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: What you need to know is that the competition's victor will get to press the button that starts the water changing process. It's an honor that's unique to this city alone.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: So you turned something that used to be trouble into a huge event...
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Hahaha, that's exactly right.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: To tell the truth, I'm very happy that the two of you made it before the competition began.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: I heard you were vacationing in Siesta before you left for our city, Ch'en?
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: What do you think of the music festival there?
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: I don't know much about music, but it was pretty lively.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Haha, I've met their mayor as well. You could say he, too, is trying his best for his city.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Sadly, he doesn't have what it takes to be the master of a city.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Besides, a music festival is nothing compared to my championship! Hahaha!
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: It looks like you two can handle yourself in a competition. If you're interested, perhaps you would consider joining the fray.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Oh, but if I'm not mistaken, the prelims will be over soon. If you are throwing your hat in the ring, don't wait much longer.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: If the two of you win together as a team, not only will you brighten Chief Wei's day, you will also get a special present from me.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: I'm not sure about teaming up, but we will give it some thought.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Now what was that extra activity you mentioned?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Oh, look at how forgetful I am. This fun activity has to do with the championship.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Sometime last week, my men busted an explosives and universal Originium circuits smuggling scheme.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: I let a lot of things happen within my borders, but that isn't one of them. You should keep this in mind, too.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: I don't think we'll need any.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Hahaha, of course. Just joking.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Normally, there would be nothing remotely fun about weapon smuggling, though, as you know, the championship is right around the corner.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: So you don't have enough manpower? Looks like they picked an interesting time to try to smuggle weapons into the city...
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: They are probably trying to pull something funny at the competition. I suggest we start with any gray areas.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Very good. Looks like I made the right decision to prepare this little activity for you two. It's wonderful that you're already interested.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Anyway, if you feel you aren't having as much fun as you'd like at any point during your stay here, you could try your hand at the investigation. For fun.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Investigating this... for fun?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Right, and especially for you, Ch'en. I know you love solving a good case.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Are you not concerned that your city is under threat?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Concerned? Ch'en, my girl, you don't understand.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: As long as I'm here, no one can threaten this city.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: You are free to forget all about this mission and enjoy your vacation, or join in the competitions.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: And even if it leads to any problems down the line, you won't be the ones to blame.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: It's just like I said. This is a fun little activity that I prepared specifically for the two of you for your vacation.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Right, we understand.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Okay, and here's the other thing.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: I would love to personally show you around Dossoles and tell you about each of the spectacles I personally erected here...
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: But since Chief Wei didn't come himself, then it also wouldn't be appropriate for me to accompany you two.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: So, I assigned you a guide.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Ernesto, come in.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Lady Candela.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: This is one of my sharpest diplomats, Ernesto.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Pleasure to meet you, señoritas.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: He speaks Yanese too, but most people here speak Victorian and Leithanian. He can translate for you.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: No need. I speak both.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Same here...
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Oh, wonderful.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: In that case, if you run into anything you need help with, such as the specifics of the championship, then he is the person to ask. Right, Ernesto?
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Yes, of course.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Of course, if you find yourself annoyed by an idiot like him, you are free to come to me with any questions directly, hahaha.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Okay, I still have other guests to meet, so please excuse me. I will leave the rest to the youth.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Thank you very much for your time, Lady Candela.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Pleased to make your acquaintance, lovely ladies. I am the International Trade Management Department's deputy director, Ernesto Salas.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Please just call me Ernesto.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: I welcome you two to our city.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: If there is anything you would like to know about the city or there is anywhere you would like to visit, please feel free to ask.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: My mission from Lady Candela is to make sure that you feel at home.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Please, don't trouble yourself.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I'm good. Thank you.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Haha. Well, first things first, your phones have already been readjusted to connect to our intercity net. You are free to make calls or look up cute videos.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Here's how you can get in touch with me or Lady Candela directly.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: And here are the credit cards that the mayor has prepared for you.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: All your transactions within the city may be paid using this card, and there is no credit limit. All your expenses will be paid by the government.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: You can go on the shopping spree of a lifetime if you'd like.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: We don't need all this.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: This is the way the city treats its guests. Please, just accept them.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Aside from that... It looks like you have some catching up to do, so I will intrude no longer.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: We will be heading to your hotel next. I will wait for you downstairs. Come look for me as soon as you're ready.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Okay...
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Long time no see, Ch'en Hui-chieh.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Long time no see, Lin Yühsia.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: How long has it been since we last met?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Don't remember. Swire's birthday two years ago?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I wasn't there.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: I see. Guess I'm mistaken.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: The class reunion the year before, perhaps?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Oh, right.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: You look like you're doing well. Lady Fumizuki will be glad.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Maybe.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: How is Swire holding up?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: You haven't heard from Hoshiguma?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: She's more or less the representative there now, and she's pretty good at it. It shouldn't be much longer before she formally takes over your job.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: That's good. She's actually pretty capable of the responsibilities that come with the job, if she works on her temperament a little.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: That's going to be difficult. She wouldn't be Swire if she knew how to mellow out.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: You're right.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I have a question.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Go ahead.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Why did you help him?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Excuse me, but we will be docking in a moment. I am wondering if you would like to get off the boat or stay on board for a little longer.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: If you two are still talking, I can also arrange a room for you...
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: I guess I came at the wrong moment?
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: No, you came at just the right moment.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Take us to the hotel, please.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Oh, of course.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Miss Ch'en?
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Let's go.
attributes.name: Ch'en
